original_text: And he took his staff in his hand, and chose him five smooth stones out of the brook, and put them in a shepherd's bag which he had, even in a scrip; and his sling was in his hand: and he drew near to the Philistine.
korean_text: 손에 막대기를 가지고 시내에서 매끄러운 돌 다섯을 골라서 자기 목자의 제구 곧 주머니에 넣고 손에 물매를 가지고 블레셋 사람에게로 나아가니라

sentences.original_text: And he took his staff in his hand
and chose him five smooth stones
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 다섯 개의 매끄러운 돌을 골랐다

sentences.original_text: and put them in a shepherd's bag
and his sling was in his hand
and he drew near to the Philistine
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 블레셋 사람에게 가까이 갔다
